answers.answer: Hi,I’ll suggest an ultrasound of the kidneys, ureter & bladder to rule out the presence of the stones in the urinary tract as that may cause the symptoms you have referred to of increased frequency of urination and decreased volume of urine. The other test I’ll recommend is blood sugar as diabetes also need to be ruled out.I sincerely believe that helps. Please do keep me posted. Kind regards.

question: iam 22 years i suffer from increasing urination friquency and decreased out put urine volume and daily urination more than 7 times and 1 time after sleep nearly 1years ago .my urine test :no any inflammation .no pain  no presence of RBC or WBC ,kidney function normalalso dribbling of urine  and  repee may be 5 or 10 minute just after urination some time urine will be colorless this case some time may be worse after ejaculationplease help me for treaement
